message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Hi Bob, I understand that $150 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to compromise. I can meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $110?

Hi Bob, I understand that $110 is still a bit of a stretch for me. However, I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can sell the product to you for $125. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $120?
